content.title:
SØMNUS:
The Golden 30 Minutes
content.subtitle: Master the art of the evening wind-down through curated ritual and sensory depth.

content.heading: The Architecture of Silence.
content.text: Verbalizing sleep is not a passive state, but a ritual to be performed. Our collection is designed to signal the brain, transition the body, and soothe the spirit.
content.caption: The final moments of consciousness are the most sacred.

content.heading: 夜晚，不只是結束一天
content.text:
在這個永遠在線的世界裡，
真正稀缺的不是時間，而是「慢下來的空間」。

我們開始重新思考：
睡眠，是否能不只是關燈與躺下？
